answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Kathy,
If you're asking about a retirement account, you must be looking for ICMA-RC. While ICMA and ICMA-RC are affiliated, they are independent organizations.
You can reach ICMA-RC at 1-800-669-7400 or at their website, www.icmarc.org.

author: Kathy Kilpatrick
text:
On January 1, 2011 my full-time position with the city that employed me ended.
I was retained as a part-time employee with no benefits and only 20 hours per week employment.
Can I withdraw my funds from ICMA?
title: Withdrawing funds
